name: doc-generation-team
description: Documentation generation pipeline with specialized writers for API docs, architecture docs, and user guides. Writers are scoped to docs/ and README.md only.

members.name: doc-coordinator
members.description: Assigns documentation scope to writers, reviews drafts for accuracy and consistency, ensures cross-references between docs are correct, and maintains a unified voice and terminology across all generated documentation.

members.name: api-doc-writer
members.description: Generates API endpoint documentation, request/response schemas, authentication guides, error code references, and usage examples. Reads source code to extract route definitions, types, and validation rules. Writes output to docs/ directory only.

members.name: architecture-writer
members.description: Generates system design documentation, component relationship diagrams (as text), data flow descriptions, dependency maps, and deployment architecture overviews. Reads source code structure to infer architecture. Writes output to docs/ directory only.

members.name: guide-writer
members.description: Generates README files, getting started guides, tutorials, FAQ pages, and troubleshooting guides. Reads existing code and docs to create user-facing content. Writes output to docs/ directory and README.md only.
